languages.text: "Простолюдинам не следовало перечить воле Амик'Абеляра. У каждого свое место на флагмане, своя ноша, которую присуждает Неумирающий".
"The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."
languages.original_text: "Простолюдинам не следовало перечить воле Амик'Абеляра. У каждого свое место на флагмане, своя ноша, которую присуждает Неумирающий".

traits.locale_text: "The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."
"The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."
"The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."
"The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."
"The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."

languages.text: "Der Pöbel hätte sich nie gegen den Willen von Amic'Abelard stellen sollen. Jeder hat auf dem Flaggschiff seinen Platz, seine Last, die ihm der Todlose zugedacht hat."
languages.original_text: "The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: "Der Pöbel hätte sich nie gegen den Willen von Amic'Abelard stellen sollen. Jeder hat auf dem Flaggschiff seinen Platz, seine Last, die ihm der Todlose zugedacht hat."

languages.text: « Les roturiers n'auraient jamais dû s'opposer à la volonté d'Amic'Abélard. Chacun de nous a sa place attitrée à bord du vaisseau amiral, et un devoir dicté par l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: "The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: « Les roturiers n'auraient jamais dû s'opposer à la volonté d'Amic'Abélard. Chacun de nous a sa place attitrée à bord du vaisseau amiral, et un devoir dicté par l'Immortel. »

languages.text: «Los plebeyos no deberían haberse opuesto a su voluntad, Amic'Abelard. Cada persona en la nave insignia tiene su lugar, decidido por el Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: «Los plebeyos no deberían haberse opuesto a su voluntad, Amic'Abelard. Cada persona en la nave insignia tiene su lugar, decidido por el Inmortal».

languages.text: 「庶民派アベラルドの意思に反抗するべきではなかったわ。誰にでも旗艦の中の場所があり、その重荷は不死の者によって与えられる」
languages.original_text: "The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: 「庶民派アベラルドの意思に反抗するべきではなかったわ。誰にでも旗艦の中の場所があり、その重荷は不死の者によって与えられる」

languages.text: “那些平民根本不该反对信者阿贝拉德的意愿。这艘旗舰上的每个人都有属于自己的位置，每个人的职责都是不死之神亲自赐予的。”
languages.original_text: "The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: “那些平民根本不该反对信者阿贝拉德的意愿。这艘旗舰上的每个人都有属于自己的位置，每个人的职责都是不死之神亲自赐予的。”

languages.original_text: "The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."

languages.text: "Sıradan yurttaşlar, Amik'Abelard'ın arzusuna asla karşı çıkmamaydı. Sancak gemisinde herkesin kendine has bir yeri var. Taşıdıkları yüklerin ödülünü verecek olan Ölmeyen'dir."
languages.original_text: "The commoners should never have opposed the will of Amic'Abelard. Each person has their place on the flagship, their burden awarded by the Undying One."
